eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; AT 05:33 PM ON NOV 21, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 01:33 AM NOV 22, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Maricopa County. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. The Maricopa County Sheriff is looking for Stephen Crane last seen 11/20/2025, 10:30 P.M. in Fountain Hills, driving a dark gray, 2015 Audi, Q5, Arizona License CHX7562 If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
